items.title: 'Now the rebuilding begins,' says Trump  as he signs Gaza peace plan
items.description: The US president says the ceasefire will hold and the second phase of negotiations for a lasting peace are under way.

items.title: Israeli hostages and Palestinian detainees freed as Trump hails 'historic dawn' in Middle East
items.description: A major hostage and prisoner exchange marks a significant step towards ending two years of war in Gaza.

items.title: 'Peace in the Middle East': Trump signs ceasefire deal in Egypt
items.description: The US president and other world leaders signed the first phase of the Gaza ceasefire deal in Sharm el-Sheik.

items.title: 'Your appointment's rescheduled': Shutdown cancels US citizenship ceremonies
items.description: When I went this weekend to take the oath to become an American citizen, I enountered disorder, and disappointment.

items.title: Eurovision organisers postpone vote on Israel's inclusion in contest next year
items.description: The European Broadcasting Union had previously announced it would hold a vote on Israel's participation in November.
